Controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for main controller of the game. Iit supervises whole gameplay.
    Author:
    Antek

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller(View view, Model model)
      Constructor initalizes itself and part of View, which may be visible before it will be rendered in models update() function.

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Main function of the game. In main loop of the game, model is updating and view is rendering altenately, as long as there is no pause/new level screen called and player life amount is bigger than zero (if is less, funtion and game ends). Every cycle of game takes fixed amount od time. This amount can be changed in class Constants - part of Utils package.

      • endOfGame

        public void endOfGame()
        Function called at the end of the game. Instructs View to show 'goodbye' view and best results.
